name: anatomically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
related to the human body and how its parts are arranged: Michelangelo’s sketches were anatomically accurate and detailed. an anatomically correct doll
related to the stucture of a plant or animal: The painting of each plant is anatomically perfect and quite beautiful. See
anatomical
More examplesFewer examplesNeanderthals were in some ways anatomically different from modern humans.You can get a bicycle anatomically suited to your height and riding style.I plan to bring one of those anatomically designed neck pillows on my next long flight.He creates bronze models of animals he finds anatomically exciting, like eagles, fruit bats, and frogs.Tigers, lions, and other big cats are similar to the domestic cat, just anatomically bigger in size.
